prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with sleek yellow fur and sharp blue accents.
Imagine a feline-inspired Pokemon that embodies speed and agility with its lightning-like features.
Design a legendary Pokemon that resembles a wild cat, combining electric and fighting traits.
Generate a Pokemon that stands out with its vivid yellow and blue colors, showcasing athleticism.
Show me a powerful mythical creature with a unique electric tail, perfect for battles.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a jungle predator, with bright colors and an energetic aura.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that has an electrifying presence and dynamic movements.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile, focusing on quick strikes
